title: on me by section 1(2) of the Private Security Services Act 2004 (No. 12 of 2004)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Private Security Services Act 2004
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Private Security Services Act 2004 

(Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited private security service act 2004 (commencement) order 2023

title: on me by section 1(2) of the Private Security Services Act 2004 (No. 12 of 2004)
heading: In this Order, “Principal Act” means the Private Security Services Act
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Principal Act” means the Private Security Services Act 

2004 (No. 12 of 2004).
text_norm: 2 order principal act mean private security service act 2004 (no 12 2004)

title: on me by section 1(2) of the Private Security Services Act 2004 (No. 12 of 2004)
heading: 3. The 29th day of September 2023 is fixed as the day on which section 37
text_raw:
3. The 29th day of September 2023 is fixed as the day on which section 37 
(amended by section 13 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2011 
(No. 23 of 2011)) of the Principal Act comes into operation in respect of an 
individual - 

(a) who provides a security service as a door supervisor, in so far as 
the said section 37 is not already in operation in respect of an 
individual who provides a security service as a door supervisor, 

(b) who provides a security service as a private investigator, or 

(c) who, as a security guard, provides the security services referred 
to in paragraph (e) of the definition of “security guard” in section 
2(1) of the Principal Act. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 September, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [473] 3
